                  PriceFieldException,
                  BookvalueFieldException
        Constructor of the stock class, initializing all data
        Parameters:
        symbol - constructs and allocates memory for the symbol variable for the investment
        name - constructs and allocates memory for the name variable for the investment
        quantity - constructs and allocates memory for the quantity variable for the investment
        price - constructs and allocates memory for the price variable for the investment
        bookValue - constructs and allocates memory for the book value variable for the investment

        EmptyFieldException

        Abstract Method to calculate book value for a mutual fund
        Parameters:
